(user or operator)."}},"RewardsDurationUpdated(uint256)":{"params":{"newDuration":"The new duration of the reward."}},"Staked(address,uint256)":{"params":{"account":"The account that has staked.","amount":"The amount of staked tokens."}},"Upgraded(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the implementation is upgraded."},"Withdrawn(address,uint256)":{"params":{"account":"The account that has withdrawn.","amount":"The amount of withdrawn tokens."}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"balanceOf(address)":{"params":{"account":"The account to get the balance for."},"returns":{"_0":"The balance of the staked tokens."}},"constructor":{"custom:oz-upgrades-unsafe-allow":"constructor"},"earned(address)":{"params":{"account":"The account to calculate the reward for."},"returns":{"_0":"The amount of reward earned by the account."}},"getReward()":{"details":"Get the reward for the caller.","returns":{"_0":"The reward amount."}},"getRewardForDuration()":{"returns":{"_0":"The total reward vested over the duration."}},"lastTimeRewardApplicable()":{"returns":{"_0":"The timestamp of the last reward distribution."}},"notifyRewardAmount(uint256)":{"details":"Can only be called by the fee collector.","params":{"reward":"The amount of reward to notify."}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"proxiableUUID()":{"details":"Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"recoverERC20(address,uint256)":{"details":"Revert if the tokenAddress is the reward token.Can only be called by the owner.","params":{"tokenAddress":"The address of the token to recover.","tokenAmount":"The amount of token to recover."}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"rewardPerToken()":{"details":"Gives current reward per token, result is scaled by PRECISION."},"rewards(address)":{"params":{"account":"The account to retrieve the reward balance for."},"returns":{"_0":"The current reward balance of the specified account."}},"setRewardsDuration(uint256)":{"details":"Revert if the reward cycle has started.Can only be called by the owner.","params":{"_rewardsDuration":"The rewards duration."}},"stake(address,uint256)":{"details":"Can only be called by the BGT contract.","params":{"account":"The account to stake for.","amount":"The amount of BGT to stake."}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes)":{"custom:oz-upgrades-unsafe-allow-reachable":"delegatecall","details":"Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event."},"userRewardPerTokenPaid(address)":{"params":{"account":"The account to retrieve the reward for."},"returns":{"_0":"The current reward balance of the specified account."}},"withdraw(address,uint256)":{"details":"Can only be called by the BGT contract.","params":{"account":"The account to withdraw for.","amount":"The amount of BGT to withdraw."}}},"title":"BGTStaker","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"Recovered(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a token has been recovered."},"RewardAdded(uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a reward has been added to the vault."},"RewardPaid(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a reward has been claimed."},"RewardsDurationUpdated(uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the reward duration has been updated."},"Staked(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the staking balance of an account has increased."},"Withdrawn(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the staking balance of an account has decreased."}},"kind":"user","methods":{"FEE_COLLECTOR()":{"notice":"The fee collector contract that is allowed to notify rewards."},"balanceOf(address)":{"notice":"Get the balance of the staked tokens for an account."},"earned(address)":{"notice":"Retrieves the amount of reward earned by a specific account."},"getReward()":{"notice":"Get the reward."},"getRewardForDuration()":{"notice":"Retrieves the total reward vested over the specified duration."},"lastTimeRewardApplicable()":{"notice":"Returns the timestamp of the last reward distribution. This is either the current timestamp (if rewards are still being actively distributed) or the timestamp when the reward duration ended (if all rewards have already been distributed)."},"lastUpdateTime()":{"notice":"The last time the rewards were updated."},"notifyRewardAmount(uint256)":{"notice":"Notify the staker of a new reward amount."},"periodFinish()":{"notice":"The end of the current reward period, where we need to start a new one."},"recoverERC20(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Recover ERC20 tokens."},"rewardPerTokenStored()":{"notice":"The last updated reward per token scaled by PRECISION."},"rewardRate()":{"notice":"The reward rate for the current reward period scaled by PRECISION."},"rewardToken()":{"notice":"ERC20 token in which rewards are denominated and distributed."},"rewards(address)":{"notice":"Get the reward balance for a specific account."},"rewardsDuration()":{"notice":"The time over which the rewards will be distributed. Current default is 7 days."},"setRewardsDuration(uint256)":{"notice":"Set the rewards duration."},"stake(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Stake BGT tokens."},"stakeToken()":{"notice":"ERC20 token which users stake to earn rewards."},"totalSupply()":{"notice":"The total supply of the staked tokens."},"undistributedRewards()":{"notice":"The amount of undistributed rewards scaled by PRECISION."},"userRewardPerTokenPaid(address)":{"notice":"Get the user reward per token paid."},"withdraw(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Withdraw BGT tokens."}},"notice":"A contract for staking BGT tokens without transferring them. BGT delegators stake in this contract and receive dApp params.account: The account to get the balance for.

returns._0: The balance of the staked tokens.

params.account: The account to calculate the reward for.

returns._0: The amount of reward earned by the account.

getReward().details: Get the reward for the caller.

returns._0: The total reward vested over the duration.
The timestamp of the last reward distribution.

notifyRewardAmount(uint256).details: Can only be called by the fee collector.

params.reward: The amount of reward to notify.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

recoverERC20(address,uint256).details: Revert if the tokenAddress is the reward token.Can only be called by the owner.

params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to recover.
params.tokenAmount: The amount of token to recover.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rewardPerToken().details: Gives current reward per token, result is scaled by PRECISION.

params.account: The account to retrieve the reward balance for.

returns._0: The current reward balance of the specified account.

setRewardsDuration(uint256).details: Revert if the reward cycle has started.Can only be called by the owner.

stake(address,uint256).details: Can only be called by the BGT contract.

params.amount: The amount of BGT to stake.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

params.account: The account to retrieve the reward for.

returns._0: The current reward balance of the specified account.

withdraw(address,uint256).details: Can only be called by the BGT contract.

params.amount: The amount of BGT to withdraw.

FEE_COLLECTOR().notice: The fee collector contract that is allowed to notify rewards.

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the balance of the staked tokens for an account.

earned(address).notice: Retrieves the amount of reward earned by a specific account.

getRewardForDuration().notice: Retrieves the total reward vested over the specified duration.

lastTimeRewardApplicable().notice: Returns the timestamp of the last reward distribution. This is either the current timestamp (if rewards are still being actively distributed) or the timestamp when the reward duration ended (if all rewards have already been distributed).

lastUpdateTime().notice: The last time the rewards were updated.

notifyRewardAmount(uint256).notice: Notify the staker of a new reward amount.

periodFinish().notice: The end of the current reward period, where we need to start a new one.

rewardPerTokenStored().notice: The last updated reward per token scaled by PRECISION.

rewardRate().notice: The reward rate for the current reward period scaled by PRECISION.

rewardToken().notice: ERC20 token in which rewards are denominated and distributed.

rewards(address).notice: Get the reward balance for a specific account.

rewardsDuration().notice: The time over which the rewards will be distributed. Current default is 7 days.

stakeToken().notice: ERC20 token which users stake to earn rewards.

totalSupply().notice: The total supply of the staked tokens.

undistributedRewards().notice: The amount of undistributed rewards scaled by PRECISION.

userRewardPerTokenPaid(address).notice: Get the user reward per token paid.

documentation.text: @notice The fee collector contract that is allowed to notify rewards.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than BGT contract.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the fee collector.
@dev Override the internal function to prevent transferring BGT.
